title: Bottle Stopper, ca. 1810
markings: Marks: Plated cap punched with unidentified mark, "J.L." (?) WPW notes that Mr. Shrubsole believes they are ficticious.
provenance: W. G. T. Burne, London; 1983 WPW
description: Pear-shaped body, cut with drapery swags and flat vertical flutes; flat circular foot; silver-plated cap with perforations

tombstone.epitaph:
Bottle Stopper, ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. glass, copper, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-22-a,b.
